</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts position from object model space to world space in render time. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> obj '''modelToWorldVisualWorld''' modelPos </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> modelPos: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - World position in format [[PositionASL]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]] [0,1,0]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[modelToWorldWorld]], [[modelToWorldVisual]], [[getPosWorldVisual]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 28, 2017 - 22:19 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command produces identical result to [[modelToWorldVisual]] command used in conjunction with [[AGLToASL]]
<code>obj [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]] [1,2,3] [[isEqualTo]] [[AGLToASL]] (obj [[modelToWorldVisual]] [1,2,3]); // true</code>
</dd>
